ygData.subject: Re: Battle against Blacknightmare.

Organics:
 
She was suprised, but absorbed the last energy ball.  The femme smirked cruelly.
"Did I forget to tell you?  I have some of my brother's abilities.  Suprised?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Blacknightmare::

The femme looked her coldy and without words she hot several energy 
balls


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> The femme buries her sword in the ground near Blacknightmare's 
head.  She grabs the minion by he shoulders and jerks her up.
> "Where is he?  Where is Malice?" the valkyrie demanded with cold 
optics.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> Blacknightmare was got by the Quickstrike's cyber poision and 
> barely  she could covered with her wings in attempt to stop 
> Organics' slam. 
> 
> She scream with pain. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice/ Injustice/ Wolfblade/ Hellplague/ Organics:
> >  
> > "Heh, with pleasure.  Maybe I can keep this one," Injustice 
said, 
> smirking.
> > He popped his knuckles and walked toward Wolfblade.  The femme 
> brought her rifle up and put right in Injustice's gut.
> > "Hands to yourself, loser," Wolfblade said before blasting a 
hole 
> straight through the clone.
> > Malice was now dep in his internal conflict.  This femme, was 
> familiar, but he knew he hadn't seen her before.  What was going 
on? 
> he thought to himself.  He fell to one knee, holding his head, 
> groaning.
> > "What's happening to me?  Why do I feel like I know her?" he 
said.
> >  
> > Hellplague was deep in her standoff with Rodimus Prime when her 
> sensors in Malice's body went off.  It was a loud pulse from her 
> comm, but she couldn't answer it.
> > "Damn!  What now?" she cursed.  
> > Break the stand off with Rodimus or let Malice suffer?  Hard 
> choice to make here.
> >  
> > Organics charged Blacknightmare and attempted a body slam.
> > "Pay attention to me, bitch!"
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > BlackNightmare/Nightstrike/Darkfate:
> > 
> > "INJUSTICE CAN YA DESTROY THAT LITTLE GIRL!!!! WE NEED 
WORK!"said 
> > the femme while she continue attaking the cannon
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley 
<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Hellplague/ Organics/ Wolfblade/ Malice/ Injustice:
> > >  
> > > Hellplague veered to one side to narrowly avoid Rodimus' 
counter 
> > attack.  She landed and skidded to a stop and levelled her 
> > disruptors at Rodimus.
> > > "Looks like it's you and me," she said, grinning devilishly.
> > >  
> > > Organics charged over to the cannon site and decided to square 
> off 
> > with Blacknightmare.
> > > "Okay, where's Malice?  We want him back!" the valkyrie said, 
> > tightening the grip on her sword.
> > >  
> > > Wolfblade ducked under the larger bots in her way and made her 
> way 
> > to the cannon.  The she saw two bots trying to tear it up.  She 
> > fired a shot close to one, and both stopped what hey were doing 
> and 
> > stepped into full view.  
> > >  
> > > It was Malice, and a bot who looked a whole lot like him.  
> > Wolfblade lowered her rifle, she only stared at Malice, who did 
> > nothing.  
> > > "Malice..." the femme said taking a step toward him.
> > > Malice said nothing, he did not recognize this litle femme, 
why 
> > did she look at him like that.  
> > > "Do I know you, miss?" The Hunter Killer asked, flexing his 
> claws.
> > > "Malice, don't you recognize me?  It's me, Wolfblade.  Come 
on, 
> > quit messing around, let's go back to base, we'll fix whatever 
> they 
> > did to you.  Comeback with me," the femme said, extending a hand 
> out 
> > to Malice.
> > > Injustice began to crack up.  This was absurd, Malice was a 
> > Minion, right?
> > > "Go play somewhere else, little gil, we'e busy," the clone 
said, 
> > smirking.
> > > "YOU SHUT UP!  I DON'T REMEMBER ASKING YOU, YOU FREAK!" 
> Wolfblade 
> > snapped, loud enough for anyone to hear.
> > > Malice, meanwhile, was secretly deep in his own conflict.  Who 
> was 
> > she really?  she semed like she knew him very well, and somehow, 
> she 
> > seemed familiar somehow, but he knew he hadn't seen her before.
> > >  
> > > Did he?
> > > 
> > > Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: Well Rattrap, try to spot any generals among 
the 
> > Sweeps. If you do spot them, thake em' out!
> > > 
> > > Rodimus the notices Hellplague diveing at him. Rodimus reaches 
> > upwards to grab Hellplague, attempting a bodyslam.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Yojinbo of Nightmare <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC:  Sorry, got a little ahead of myself.
> > > 
> > > Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague/ Malice/ 
> > Injustice/ 
> > > Necross/ Splattercannon:
> > > 
> > > Hellplague reeled back as Rodimus returned fire.  He armor 
bore 
> > the 
> > > brunt of the damage, but it slowed her down for a minute 
before 
> > she 
> > > dived down to engage Rodimus in one on one combat.  
> > > "Blacknightmare!  They're a little thick here!  Time for that 
> back 
> > > up!" the Sweep commander called into her comm link.
> > > 
> > > Organics and wolfblade were more or less holding their own 
with 
> > the 
> > > Sweeps.  Wolfblade was able to keep ahead of the larger bots 
and 
> > > blast holes in them.  Organics was flying circles around the 
> > Sweeps, 
> > > but they kept coming.
> > > 
> > > Megatron dashed toward a group of Sweeps that had congregated 
> > around 
> > > Hydras.  The clone drew his massive sword and charged into the 
> > melee, 
> > > each swing of his sword fell several of Unicron's 
footsoldiers.  
> > He 
> > > made his way close enough to ask the Predacon leader a 
question:
> > > "Are you well enough to fight?"
> > > 
> > > "Let's go!  They need us now!" Malice said as he hung on to 
> > > Blacknightmare.
> > > "Yeah, I want a piece of the action too!" Injustice exclaimed, 
> > > wiggling in Nightstrike's grip.
> > > Necross remained in his robot form, silent through the whole 
> > ordeal.  
> > > Splattercannon too, remained silent, but wanted to go in and 
> shot 
> > > some Maximals full of holes.

<roborick007@y...>

in

swords,

Prime.

in

one

looking 
> > > around.

> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: You all know what is at stake here. Our 
> > > > > possibility 
> > > > > > for survival. This cannon may be our only defense 
against 
> > the 
> > > > chaos 
> > > > > > bringer, Unicron. We cannot aford to lose it. I'm sure 
> this 
> > > > battle 
> > > > > > will be fierce but it is also the most importent battle 
> any 
> > of

> > > > > > have fought in a long time. I want you all to look 
around

> > > > > > notice how importent this moment will be in Cybertronian

> > > > > > this ground Autobots, Maximals, Decepticons, Predacons 
and 
> > > > > > Tripredacus are all united for the first time in one 
comon 
> > > > effort. 
> > > > > > We do not fight to destroy each other but to insure all 
of 
> > our 
> > > > > > survival. Autobots, Decepticons and otherwise, these are 
> > mere 
> > > > > terms.

> > > > > > >

> > > > is

<DIV>Organics:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>She was suprised, but absorbed the last energy ball.  The femme smirked cruelly.</DIV>
<DIV>"Did I forget to tell you?  I have some of my brother's abilities.  Suprised?"<BR><BR><B><I>airly2000 <airly2002@...></I></B> wrote:</DIV>
